Sets minimum luminance levels for lines drawn

Parameters:
luminance1 - Top-left to down right 1
luminance2 - Top-right to bottom left 1
luminance3 - Top-left to down right 2
luminance4 - Top-right to bottom left 2
luminance5 - Blobs
